title: How to get rid of annoying popup before each call about Google Voice, and Use Carrier button
content:
I am trying to get rid of this prompt that happens each time I try to place a call. I have to select that I want to use my carrier.

I've tried changing Google voice settings and phone settings, but do not know which setting it is related to. Yesterday I started having the issue.


Prompt:
Google voice calling account was removed The account configured to use Google voice has been removed please go to the voice app to re-enable it calling the Google voice by has been disabled and you will need to re-enable it in the app to place calls through voice You may place the call through the carrier if you wish.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
